title: [K-12] Irrigation Infrastructure Development Evaluation: Inquiry-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of water resource management and understanding of project evaluation methodologies
context.additional_context: Exploration of practical assessment models based on the Telangana, India case study

learning_goals: Learners can apply a multi-criteria approach ([I]NSPECT model) to comprehensively evaluate the economic, environmental, and social impacts of irrigation projects.
Learners can propose strategies to optimize the cost-benefit ratio in irrigation infrastructure development through real-world case analysis.
Learners can design and implement interdisciplinary collaboration plans through an inquiry-based learning process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
